cli_content:
ID    Description                               Severity    State
----  -----------------------------------------  ----------  ------
1     Power Supply Failure                      Major        Active
2     Fan Failure                               Critical     Inactive
3     Temperature Threshold Exceeded            Minor        Active
4     Voltage Out of Range                      Major        Inactive
textfsm_template:
Value ID (\d+)
Value DESCRIPTION (.+)
Value SEVERITY (\w+)
Value STATE (\w+)

Start
  ^ID\s+Description\s+Severity\s+State\s*$$
  ^----+\s+-----------------------------------------+\s+----------+\s+------\s*$$
  ^\s*${ID}\s+${DESCRIPTION}\s+${SEVERITY}\s+${STATE}\s*$$ -> Record
